name: mv-db-query-server
description: MCP server para queries seguros de solo lectura - soporta MySQL y PostgreSQL

scripts.build: esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --outfile=dist/index.js --format=esm --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" --external:mysql2 --external:pg
